stories.title: Expand and Collapse Home Folder
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand and collapse the 'Home' folder so that I can navigate its contents.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Home' folder is visible, When I click on its icon, Then it should expand to show 'Desktop', 'Documents', 'Office', and 'Downloads' if collapsed or collapse to hide them if expanded.

stories.title: Select Files in Desktop
stories.description: As a user, I want to select files in the 'Desktop' folder so that I can perform actions on 'Notes' and 'Commands'.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Desktop' folder is expanded, When I click the checkbox next to 'Notes' or 'Commands', Then it should be marked as selected.

stories.title: Select Office Files
stories.description: As a user, I want to select files in the 'Office' folder so that I can manage 'Public', 'Private', 'Classified', and 'General'.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Office' folder is expanded, When I click the checkbox next to 'Public', 'Private', 'Classified', or 'General', Then it should be marked as selected.

stories.title: Toggle All Folders in Downloads
stories.description: As a user, I want to toggle files in the 'Downloads' folder so that I can view 'Word File.doc' and 'Excel File.doc'.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Downloads' folder is expanded, When I click on 'Word File.doc' or 'Excel File.doc', Then the file should be selected.
